page.title: 18FURTHER EDUCATION
page.content: The local Comprehensive School is used{two evenings}a week as a{Further {Education Centre.}Adults, young and old, can come along and follow courses in many different subjects. These include{upholstery, woodwork, and {guitar playing.}Foreign languages are also taught eg.{French and German. {B.Y.A.G. (Brinsworth Youth {Activities Group)}is a group which is organised to provide{'out of school'} activities for pupils and ex-pupils. You can choose to go{climbing, {sailing, canoeing,}take part in{drama, or play sport eg.{badminton,football {or judo.}Social events are held too with some competitions. The group have also helped to run { {disco's}for some of the local{primary {schools. }
